cause.description:
Our sole mission is to ensure that Hillary Clinton does not make Bill the first lady. It does not matter if a democrat or a republican wins the election. Our only concern is that Hillary loses. This is a movement that people from all political persuasions, all ethnic backgrounds, and all economic status' can rally behind. Please join this CAUSE and donate to keep Clinton's slimy, spineless and socialist hands off the presidency.
1. Hillary's socialism will only hurt America.
2. Clinton is not the person to protect America.
cause.mission: Keep Hillary Clinton out of the White House
cause.name: NO to Hillary Clinton
